details.sectionContent:
We believe that Indian youth has the power and energy to make it the abode of vivacity, inspiration, and creation and thus we strive to create the perfect platform for such edgy minds with disruptive ideas that have the potential to enable better lives.

Prakarsh currently in its 15th edition, has been host to some of the biggest stalwarts of the industry over the years. This year we introduce to you, E-CONCLAVE! to inspire countless ideas, expedite innovative start-ups and multiply fruitful networks through a jam-packed cluster of events designed for everyone.

In this workshop you will get knowledge about Pitching. Which means that in this workshop the main points which are going to be covered are, What is pitching in brief, how to pitch, how to execute idea before pitching it in front of the jury. In this workshop you will be getting all important knowledge which is required for pitching a startup idea in front of Jury.

The event is not over yet. In this event each and every participant is getting chance of pitching there startup - idea in front of the Jury. And the one whoâ€™s got the best idea, will be getting instant funding from the different companies. And will also get a chance to expand there startup idea on the huge stage. And the top 3 will also get a support form GTU SSIP.
